about_the_game:
"Villa No. 1": A suspenseful puzzle game set in a mysterious villa. A grad takes a high-paying job there, uncovering hidden secrets of the enigmatic family and discovering the house's dark past. His soul is tested as he uncovers the truth.

Game Features

  • The story takes place in a mysterious villa in the suburbs. A fledgling college student came here because he was eager for a high salary. He thought he was just a sleep tester. As he explored the villa in depth, he discovered that he had always been a mysterious employer. There seems to be a huge secret hidden, and what's even weirder is that the neighbor actually told him that this house was a haunted house, and he was faced with a major choice...

  • You can experience the weird storyline and feel the slight terror

  • The game contains heavy family issues, as well as young people’s thoughts and decisions

  • The retro dim painting style reminds people of the feeling of turning on the old-fashioned TV in the afternoon after the rain.

  • The game delivers a sense of silent suspense through layers of reversals, with very few face-turning kills, but the complexity of human nature can still shock people.

  • In the story, you will embark on a midnight adventure in a mysterious and dangerous place

  • As the story unfolds, progressive

  • emotions, reversal of plots, and mysterious characters will appear one by one.

  • The scariest thing is that if you think this is a story, it might be happening somewhere in the world...

  • A young man's naughtiness, fear, and determination are shown in different situations. You will understand why bravery is the most valuable quality of a person.

  • Brothers and sisters who once lived together in a close family turned against each other in the middle of the night.

  • The puzzles are designed to be of moderate difficulty, and you won’t be discouraged from giving up once you get started. The most important thing is that they are full of fun.

  • Puzzles and plot are closely integrated, everything is for the story!
